name: Geonocturn: The Boiler
description:
This is an early demo/prototype of a narratively driven roguelite with isometric tile-based combat.

Controls:
WASD and scrollwheel for camera
1, 2, 3, 4 for different hotbar buttons
I for inventory
Use the Wait button (or 4 on the keyboard) to go to different rooms on gray tiles, or to other floors on ladder tiles.

Collect Tears by exploring rooms and floors of The Boiler to upgrade yourself before going deeper!

This game is meant to be played in a 16:9 resolution and may not function correctly in other aspect ratios. There is also no save feature currently implemented but will be coming later.

All sounds from Epidemic Sound (https://www.epidemicsound.com/)
Combat music: Otherside Station Scramble by Halley Labs/Emma Essex (https://halleylabs.com/)
